summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Paint (Boya) module for Buse Kağıt flexo paper factory. All backend APIs (16 tests) and frontend UI flows passed successfully.

issues: Dialog stays open after insufficient stock error - user must manually close. This is acceptable UX as user may want to correct the amount.

passed_tests: Paint password login (432122) - correct and incorrect password handling
12 paints displayed with stock values (Siyah, Beyaz, Kırmızı, Mavi, Yeşil, Sarı, Turuncu, Mor, Pembe, Kahverengi, Gri, Turkuaz)
Stock add operation (+ button) - adds stock correctly
Stock remove operation (- button) - removes stock correctly
Send to machine operation (blue button) - sends to machine with machine selection
Receive from machine operation (yellow button) - receives from machine with machine selection
Insufficient stock validation - shows error toast 'Yetersiz stok! Mevcut: X kg'
History tab (Geçmiş) - shows movement records with paint name, operation type, amount, machine, date
Analytics tab (Analiz) - shows total consumption, pie chart, bar charts
Analytics period toggle (Haftalık/Aylık) - switches between weekly and monthly
Tab navigation (Stok, Geçmiş, Analiz) - all tabs work correctly
Backend: GET /api/paints - returns all paints with stock
Backend: POST /api/paints/transaction - handles add, remove, to_machine, from_machine
Backend: GET /api/paints/movements - returns movement history with filtering
seed_data_creation: Test transactions created for Siyah and Gri paints during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Paint module fully tested. 12 paints initialized with Beyaz having 50kg stock. Test transactions exist for Siyah (7kg) and Gri (155.5kg). All 4 transaction types (add, remove, to_machine, from_machine) work correctly. Analytics shows consumption data.
